Definition.WordDefinition: piggy adj : resembling swine; coarsely gluttonous or greedy; "piggish table manners"; "the piggy fat-cheeked little boy and his porcine pot-bellied father"; "swinish slavering over food" [syn: {hoggish}, {piggish}, {porcine}, {swinish}] n : a young pig [syn: {piglet}, {shoat}] [also: {piggiest}, {piggier}]
